inn1.comm: good length around middle and off, Warner pushes forward and defends on the off side
shorter length on a straighter line, Warner gets on his toes and tucks the ball through square for a single
good length on off and middle, with a hint of movement into the left-hander, Hughes stays in his crease and blocks
Hughes moves back and across to defend one that seams across him from a good length
short of a length with some width outside off, Hughes stays back and opens the face to steer behind point
Warner sees width and goes after the short ball, trying to blast through point, he gets a thick outside edge that flies down to third man, where Kulasekara makes a fine one-handed pick up and throw
pitches on a good length around leg and swings towards off, squaring Hughes up as he defends from his crease
pitches on middle and moves away from Hughes, who defends on the back foot
good length outside off, Hughes covers his stumps and shoulders arms
good length pitching outside leg stump and angling towards it, Hughes moves a long way across towards the off side to glance towards square and was beaten, that ball was so close to leg stump

caught behind! Kulasekara gets the ball to swing late from a good length from leg and middle stump line, Hughes is caught on the crease and squared up as he prods in defence, the outside edge is taken by Chandimal moving to his left
good length, but pitching slightly wide outside off stump, the ball cuts into Clarke who thrusts his pad forward to cover off stump and shoulders arms
glanced off the pads behind square for a single, Mathews is a bit too straight to the left-hander from over the wicket
shot, Clarke! He strides forward to a length delivery outside off and caresses the ball through cover with a flowing drive. That ball moved away from the right-hander a little
defended on the front foot towards point
once more, Clarke gets on to the front foot as the ball begins to move away from him and drives fluently through cover, hitting the ball all along the ground
good length just outside off stump, Clarke moves to cover off stump before shouldering arms
the line is on the pads this time and Clarke flicks through square leg, Clarke's throwing the counterpunch here
Kulasekara gets the ball to go late again, pitching on middle and off before jagging past the outside edge of Warner's forward push at the last moment
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
there's more width outside off to Warner tries to play the cover drive but he gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
pitches outside leg this time, Warner stays back and tucks the ball off his pads behind square

a huge appeal for lbw but the umpire says not out. Warner got an inside edge on to the pad as he pushed forward to defend. Looked like the ball hit both pad and inside edge around the same time. Pitched outside leg stump too
wider outside the off stump, Warner lets it go
once again Mathews is too straight to Clarke and the batsman flicks the ball into the huge expanse of vacant outfield at deep midwicket
that ball came back into the left-hander, Warner wanted to drive on the off but adjusted his shot into a defence
short of a length outside off and Warner drags it from all the way there with a flat-bat and pulls it over mid-on, didn't time it at all and the ball plugs in the outfield
he's timed this alright, width outside off stump and Warner slashes hard to cut the short ball to the point boundary
pushed into the off side for a quick single
Clarke's timing is superb, he simply pushes a ball that angles into him through wide mid-on, giving Malinga some running to do
tucked off the hips towards square for a sharp single

another loud appeal for lbw but the umpire Paul Reiffel says not out. Mahela decides not to review. Kulasekara got the ball to nip back into Clarke from outside off, Clarke had got his front pad outside the line of off stump so that wouldn't have been reversed
another appeal for lbw but I suspect the ball was missing leg this time. Clarke moved forward and across to try and flick a full ball that swung into him, and was hit on the pad
Warner stays in his crease and defends on the leg side

a third appeal for lbw in the over but umpire Reiffel is unmoved again. I think that pitched outside leg stump, but Mahela has asked for a review. He seemed to ask Kulasekara whether it pitched in line and the bowler seemed to indicate that it did. I did not. It pitched well outside leg and wouldn't have hit the stumps anyway. A horrid review from Sri Lanka.
Warner stays back and gets squared up by one that pitches leg and seams across the left-hander, he gets an outside edge that goes along the ground behind point
he starts with a slower ball on a tight length and line, Warner was on the front foot a little early and he defends back to the bowler
he tries to hit the good length ball through cover but the room isn't there for the shot, he gets an inside edge on the leg side
played off the back foot to cover point, a slower ball that was
a mis-field at cover point allows the single after Warner slapped it off the back foot
Clarke takes his bottom hand off the bat as he defends one that rises from a length
good length outside off, Clarke lets it go
Warner's blasted this off the front foot, the length was a bit too full outside off and Warner flayed it past mid-off with a fierce drive
good length, pitches around off and seams away from Warner, who watches it go past
look at the timing on that! Warner simply moved forward and punched at a length ball going away from him, it screamed through cover point, and Jeevan Mendis just about caught up with it
that's rash, Warner tries to drive away from his body and is beaten by a big away swinger
pushed off the pads between mid-on and midwicket
good length just outside off stump, Warner lets it go through to Chandimal
played off the back foot towards point
Clarke moves forward and turns the length ball through square leg
Warner hits the length ball hard off the front foot, the fielder at cover dives to his right to make the stop
the slower ball outside off, Warner had moved forward and waited for it, before driving to cover

shot! He's ramped it over the keeper and the cordon. Warner swayed out of the line of the short of a length ball and angled his bat so the ball could bounce off the middle and fly to the third man boundary
Malinga responds with a yorker that Warner digs out on the leg side
Kulasekara seams the ball on to the pads, Clarke moves across his crease and turns the ball through square leg
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
Kulasekara gets one to hold its line outside off and has Clarke playing inside it, the ball beat the outside edge
turned off the pads through square, Malinga charges in, picks up with one hand and throws on the bounce to Chandimal, who fails to collect and concedes an overthrow
defended from the crease

Clarke's been given lbw and he's asked for a review too. Kulasekara hit the pad with a big inswinger, it moved sharply into Clarke off the seam. Clarke was pushing forward and was hit in line too. Replays indicate the ball would have clipped the top of middle. He's got to go.
short of a length into the body, Warner plays the short-arm pull behind square
what a ball that is, Hussey did superbly to get out of the way. Malinga got the ball to rear up sharply from just short of a length, Hussey smelled that as he leapt back and swayed out of the way.
another short ball, which is a bit easier to leave
good length with some movement away from Hussey who swishes and is beaten
short of a length and straight, Hussey jumps back and defends on the off side
Hussey stays in his crease and steers a length ball behind point to get off the mark
Kulasekara gets the ball to swing into Hussey who closes the face and plays towards square
pitches outside off on a good length and seams into the right-hander, Hussey moves back and defends on the off side
strays on to the pads this time so Hussey taps it behind square for a single
good length on middle and off, Warner defends on the off side
Warner defends one that pitches around leg and begins to seam across

that's hit him where it hurts most and Warner's down on his knees. That ball wasn't short enough to pull and Warner tried to short-arm pull it through square. Not sure whether that hit him off the inside edge but Warner needs a couple of minutes to gather himself. That hit him flush on the box off the bottom edge.

Thirimanne's caught it after a juggle at first slip! Malinga bowled a beautiful outswinger, pitching around off and moving away. Hussey, having been peppered by the short stuff, stayed back and prodded away from his body, nicking it to Thirimanne's left. He caught it, lost grip but grabbed it again before falling to the ground.
he gets beaten by one that pitches on a good length outside off and seams away from the right-hander
What a ball that is, Malinga pitches on a great length around off stump and gets it to move ever so late to beat the outside edge of Bailey's forward defence
this is some special bowling from Lasith, another one beats the outside edge after angling into the right-hander, pitching around off and moving away late
he's been beaten four times in a row by the one that moves away late, Malinga must be wondering what he needs to do to hit that outside edge

Malinga tries to swing it away from the right-hander from a straighter line but doesn't get the ball to move as much, Bailey finally gets bat on ball as he moves forward and defends, the SCG crowd gives him a cheer
Warner, who's been camped at the other end, hits a short of a length ball to cover
the bouncer also swings, a touch down leg side, Warner lets it go and Chandimal has to dive to his right to collect
short ball and Warner pulls with power to deep square leg
nips into Bailey from off stump, glanced off the pads towards square
defended on the front foot on the on side
steered off the back foot behind point
good length outside off, Warner covers his stumps and blocks
Malinga's tormenting Bailey with these fast outswingers. Bailey tries to push off the front foot once again but is beaten
pitches on middle this time and begins to move away from Bailey, who gets squared up as he defends
defended on the front foot towards cover
Bailey moves forward and defends on the off side once again, not as much outswing from Malinga this time
the outside edge, Malinga's found it, but the ball goes on the bounce to third slip. Bailey pushed from his crease at one that pitched off and began to move away

Bailey clips one that is nearly in the blockhole between midwicket and mid-on, the fielder has a long chase and I think he manages to pull the ball back in the nick of time, but the batsmen have run four
pitches outside leg and Warner gets hit on the pad as he tries to glance behind square
good length outside off stump, Bailey shoulders arms
short of a length outside off stump, Bailey tries to slap it through cover point but doesn't time it
shot! A half-volley from Perera and Bailey dispatches it to the straight boundary with a fluent straight drive. Kulasekara chases but the outfield is too quick for him
played off the front foot with a closed face towards midwicket
Perera gets the ball to nip sharply into Bailey from outside off, he gets hit on the pad
length ball angling away from Warner who moves forward and plays to point
defended on the off side
short of a length just outside off stump, Warner goes back and cuts to third man
defended on the off side
Bailey jumps back and tries to defend a short of a length ball, he gets a bottom edge on to his thigh
a fuller ball around off stump, Bailey drives fluently off the front foot but can't beat mid-off

Warner hasn't had much strike in the last ten overs and so he attacks when he can. The ball was full and Warner launched it off the front foot over mid-on, didn't time it perfectly but it was hit well enough
driven through point for a single
Bailey carves the short of a length ball towards third man and the ball bounces a few metres short of the fielder
pitches outside leg stump and Warner taps the ball into the gap in front of square to take a hard-run double
short of a length and Warner pulls the ball along the ground through midwicket for two more
tapped off the back foot through midwicket for a single, 11 off the over
length ball pitching in line with the stumps and angling across the left-hander, Warner stays in his crease and lets the ball slide off the face of the bat towards third man
Bailey steers the short of a length ball down to third man
Bailey gets hit on the pad as he moves across and tries to glance a good length ball, Matthews appeals but that was missing leg
defended on the off side
the slower ball angling into the right-hander, nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
defended back to the bowler
Warner goes back and cuts the ball from middle stump towards point
drifts on to the pads with fine leg in the circle, Bailey goes back and works the ball off his pads towards fine leg, Malinga chases and fumbles a little on the slide
cut off the back foot through cover point
defended back to the bowler
Bailey steps out of his crease and pushes toward mid-off
Warner dabs the ball close on the off side, he had come out of his crease and then had to adjust
Bailey stays in his crease and punches to cover
played from the crease towards cover again, no real movement from Mathews
good length outside off, Bailey moves forward and defends towards point
shot! Bailey moves forward to a length ball and drives it fluently through extra cover, splitting the gap between cover and mid-off
just a bit short outside off and Bailey pulls it to mid-on, I suspect he wanted to hit that squarer
good length around off stump, Bailey moves forward and defends
Warner stays back and pushes the ball from leg and middle in front of square
Bailey pushes forward and then opens the face late to steer the ball towards third man, Herath hasn't turned the ball

what has Bailey done! He came down the pitch and tried to hit over the top, instead he mis-hit it straight to Thisara Perera at mid-on, he's thrown away a start, and after he battled hard early on. Bailey was beaten in the flight
Wade stays back and defends towards the bowler
played through point for a single
pushed off the front foot towards point
defended on the front foot on the leg side
short of a length on middle and off, Wade stays back and blocks
driven on the front foot towards cover
Wade pushes forward at a ball that seams away from a good length and beats the outside edge, not much excitement from the Sri Lankans for the caught behind, no edge
defended back to the bowler
Wade jumps across his stumps and defends on the off side
played off the pads behind square
nudged off the pads behind square for a quick single
Warner attempts to play the ball down the ground but gets an inside edge on to his boot

a superb shot, Warner steps out of his crease, gets to the pitch of the ball, and drives along the ground to the extra cover boundary to bring up a half-century that has held Australia together at the SCG
defended on the front foot to the bowler
hit off the back foot to the fielder at short midwicket
defended on the back foot towards point, Mathews is keeping it simple and straight
played back to the bowler
in the air but through point, Wade came forward and played the square drive to a length ball outside off
good length and straight, Wade moves forward and defends
driven off the front foot towards cover
Warner square drives a good length ball and it falls just short of the fielder diving forward at point
steps out of his crease and hits the ball through square
comes forward and pushes to cover

Warner cuts hard and late, Mahela moves quickly to his right and dives to stop the ball with one hand. He throws to the keeper while on the ground but Wade had run quickly as well to complete the single
played towards midwicket
defended on the leg side
driven from the crease to mid off
Warner is smacked on the glove by one that bounces sharply from a good length, he plays the ball towards point and shakes his hand in pain as he runs the single
played towards midwicket for a single
short of a length outside off, hit off the back foot through cover
Warner stays in his crease and drives a fuller ball to mid-off
short of a length just outside off, Warner stays back and plays towards point
a fuller ball but Warner does not come forward, he stays in his crease and drives to cover
lovely use of the feet from Wade, who skipped down the track to get to the pitch of the ball and drove along the ground to the extra cover boundary
he comes out once again and turns the ball off his pads in front of square
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Warner steps out and drives to cover
gets down low this time and paddles the ball behind square
Wade steps out and clips the ball off his pads to short midwicket
Chandimal fails to collect cleanly after Warner is beaten by one that pitches on a good length around off and seams away, he was trying to drive from the crease
short of a length outside off, Wade stays back and cuts the ball hard through point

edged but there's no slip and it's gone to the third man boundary for four! Chandimal didn't dive for it, it was a tough one but I reckon he could have attempted it. Warner had tried to cut one that seamed away from him
steered behind point for a single
Wade moved forward to play on the off side but got an inside edge on to leg

a huge appeal for lbw and the umpire raises the finger though I thought Warner had got a big inside edge on to his pad. Warner is dismayed as he sees the finger go up and he can't review it because Clarke had used up the only review available. And he had got a massive inside edge as he played from his crease at a good length ball that pitched around leg and middle
defended on the front foot
steps forward and drives through midwicket for a single
nudged on the leg side
a half-appeal for lbw as Henriques is beaten by the one that slides into him from round the wicket
driven to cover off the front foot
defended on the off side
good length outside off stump, defended on the front foot
the ball bounces a bit more from short of a length and beats Henriques on the cut
defended on the back foot on the off side
short of a length outside off, Henriques cuts off the back foot behind point
Wade takes his bottom hand off the bat to fend one that rises sharply from a good length down on the leg side
defended on the off side
Henriques moves forward and defends on the off side
Wade leans forward and pushes the ball into the gap at cover for a single
goes deep into his crease to defend on the pitch

another lbw, and the umpires have missed another inside edge! Herath bowled the one that goes on with the arm to Henriques, who prodded forward to defend. The ball went on to the pad off the inside edge, and like Warner, Henriques has to go too
defended on the front foot
Johnson pushes forward and dabs the ball in front of point for a risky single, the throw misses at the bowler's end and the batsmen run an overthrow
full ball outside off, Wade drives firmly to mid-on
Johnson flicks the full ball off his pads behind square and there maybe a run-out here. No, Johnson's safe as he hares back for the second, it needed a direct hit to run him out
good length outside off, Johnson lets it go
a fuller ball outside off and Johnson drives to mid-off
short of a length on the hips, worked from the crease through square
good length on middle and off, Wade moves forward and across to push the ball to mid-on
Wade steps out of his crease, isn't to the pitch of the ball, and defends on the leg side
dabbed off the pads towards square and Johnson sets off, Wade sends him back and Johnson had to dive desperately, the throw missed at the bowler's end
driven firmly back to the bowler
played off the front foot towards mid-off, not timed well
wider outside the off stump, Johnson lets it go
Johnson moves forward and defends on the leg side
Wade tries to drive through cover but gets a thick outside edge towards third man
the ball rears up from just short of a length and Johnson lifts his bat out of the way
a full ball outside off and Johnson plays a straight drive past the bowler for two runs
Johnson lets another one go outside off after the ball lifts from a good length and angles across the left-hander
this time Johnson chooses to drive away from his body and gets beaten on the inside edge by one that slants away from him
good length outside off, Johnson lets it go this time
Wade steps out of his crease and works the full ball off his pads in front of square
Johnson stays in his crease and taps the ball towards midwicket
punched off the back foot towards mid-off, Herath is keeping the ball on a tight line and length
pushed off the front foot but the ball goes on the leg side off the inside edge
Johnson tries to drive but gets an outside edge towards backward point
in the blockhole and Johnson digs it out towards cover
the slower offcutter, pitching on leg and moving across Wade, who stays in his crease and defends
Malinga greets him with a fast bouncer, forcing Wade to duck in a hurry
Wade's still outside his crease as Malinga delivers a fuller ball outside off, Wade defends on the off side
the slower ball on middle stump, defended on the off side
another short ball, and Wade lets it go outside off stump
Wade's going to struggle to play short balls standing where he is, a metre outside his crease, Malinga bangs it in again and Wade lets it go
defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot to cover
Jonson pushes forward and gets an outside edge that runs towards third man
defended from the crease back to the bowler
played from the crease towards cover
clipped off his toes towards long-on, and that's the end of Herath's spell - 2 for 37

Johnson isn't standing outside his crease, and he's fallen lbw, that is plumb. Malinga delivers a full ball that slants across Johnson from over the wicket before it tails late into the left-hander. Johnson is caught prodding from his crease, the ball beats the inside edge and crashes into the pad. No doubt there.
a full ball outside off and Starc drives from his crease through point
there he goes! Starc lines up a length ball and hits through it, carting the ball over mid-off to the boundary
Malinga replies with a bouncer and Starc ducks under it
a low full toss wide outside off, Starc reaches for it and plays the ball on the off side
played off the pads towards midwicket
short of a length around off, punched off the back foot in front of point
pitches on a good length around middle and seams across the left-hander, who pushes from his crease and is beaten
loud shout for lbw as Starc is squared up and beaten, that hit him on the thigh so too high
a flashy drive from Starc and he hits the ball in the air past a diving Dilshan at point
a fuller ball on leg and middle stump, Starc gets a bit of a leading edge towards mid-off
Starc pushes forward at another good length ball that seams away from him and is beaten
short of a length and straight, nudged off the body through midwicket
Starc chips a length ball in the air and into the gap at deep midwicket
Wade tries to blast a good length ball that angles across him over cover but misses
driven from the crease to mid-off

Wade takes a hand off the bat as he dabs close on the leg side and runs, there's no one in the circle so the bowler has to field himself, they run two and Wade has to hurry to complete the second but the throw to the keeper is poor
once again Wade plays the ball into the empty infield at midwicket and the batsmen run two before the fielder in the deep can run in and try to prevent it

that's top edged but it's fallen safe! Starc tried to hook a short ball from Mathews and was hit on the glove. The ball lobbed up towards where a leg gully would have been and Chandimal could not reach it
played to backward point for a single
the slower ball and Starc stays in his crease and defends
too straight and Starc glances the ball off his pads into the gap behind square leg
the short of a length delivery down leg side, Mathews has got away with that as Starc missed the swat behind square
a sharp bouncer this time and Starc is beaten on the hook
played with an open face towards third man for a single
a full ball outside off and Starc drives the ball hard to long-off, where the fielder covers good ground to prevent the second

caught at third man! Wade's gone. The ball was short of a length outside off, Wade got under it and cut hard off the front foot, slashing it straight to Kulasekara as he ran in from the third man boundary, Australia lose their eighth
Starc swings a length ball from leg and middle to the backward square leg boundary
Starc rides the bounce of a short of a length ball and taps it through square leg
short of a length outside off, McKay lets it go
nudged off the back foot through square leg
defended on the front foot on the off side
McKay tries to pull a short ball and top edges it, the ball falls safely in the vacant midwicket region
Starc stays in his crease and chips a length ball towards wide long on
shot! Starc moves forward and swings a length ball cleanly from around off stump for a one-bounce four to wide long-on
Starc begins to move forward and then is beaten by the bouncer
McKay pulls his bat away from a delivery that pitches on a good length around off and moves away
McKay moves forward and pushes at an outswinger, which beats the bat
pushed off the front foot towards cover
good length and very straight, McKay defends on the front foot
some width outside off and McKay goes after it, he gets an outside edge that falls safely at third man
short ball and Starc pulls along the ground to deep square leg
hit off the front foot towards cover
length ball and Starc hammers it off the front foot to deep midwicket
played towards mid-off off the front foot
driven on the front foot on the off side
bowled him! McKay came out of his crease and tried to hammer the ball down the ground. It was the slower one and McKay was beaten
defended on the front foot towards point
shot! Starc stays in his crease and drills a full ball wide of the diving fielder at mid-on, he's playing a gem
full and straight, Starc drives to long off for a single
short of a length, and straight, Starc nudges the ball off his hips towards square
too full down the leg side, that's a wide
Doherty gets smacked on the glove by a short ball but it falls short of Jeevan Mendis running in and diving forward from point
short of a length outside off, steered towards third man off the back foot
length ball outside off, steered from the crease behind point for a single, he keeps the strike
Starc was looking to swing through the leg side but got a leading edge that flew between point and cover, that almost reached the boundary. Dilshan did well to slide and save
Doherty moves back and across to defend on the off side
driven off the front foot to cover

a short ball and Doherty pulls with power into the gap on the cow corner boundary, Kushal Perera sprints to his right from deep square leg and dives full length in desperation, he manages to tap the ball back but it goes on to roll into the rope
left alone outside off stump
good length and straight, the batsman defends
that's full, wide outside off stump, Starc tries to reach for it but can't make contact
that's streaky, and Australia go past 200 thanks to Starc. He tried to dig out a blockhole delivery outside off stump and got an inside edge that sent the ball racing to the fine leg boundary
driven from the crease towards long off
another boundary, off the pad this time. Doherty moved across his crease to a full ball and missed the glance. Malinga thought he had a chance for lbw but that was missing leg stump
defends a straight ball quite calmly
a short ball, and Doherty lets it go, Starc will have first strike for the final over
short ball, Starc pulls with power along the ground to the fielder at deep midwicket, they decide against the second
another edge to the boundary! Doherty charges and slogs, nicking a short of a length ball to third man for four
a full ball outside off, Doherty squeezes it through point for a single
short ball, on leg stump, Starc gets down on one knee and pulls the ball to the backward square leg boundary, he moves on to 46, playing a blinder, the SCG love it

there's his 50! Starc raises his bat to a massive ovation from the funnily dressed and the normally clothed at the SCG. He got there with another pull while down on one knee, that ball screamed to the midwicket boundary
a low full toss and Starc hits it to deep midwicket for two more, he's unbeaten on 52, having led Australia to 222, which is far more than seemed possible when Wade fell

inn2.comm: short of a length around off stump, Mahela moves back and defends on the off side
the ball rises and angles into Mahela from outside off stump, Mahela gets on top of the bounce and opens the face of his bat off the back foot to steer the ball to third man
Dilshan cuts a good length ball outside off, mis-times it behind point
Mahela moves back and across to dab a good length ball on the leg side for a single
Dilshan attempts a booming drive to a good length ball that holds its line and is beaten
short of a length outside off, McKay lets it go with a grunt, Dilshan also lets it go, without grunting

there's an inside edge on to the pad and there's no lbw appeal. Starc pitched the ball full and got it to shape into Mahela after slanting across him, Mahela tried to play on the leg side and closed the face
full ball outside off stump, Mahela drives fluently but the shot is stopped at short cover
Mahela stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
in the blockhole outside off stump, Mahela tries to drive through the off but gets an inisde edge on the leg side, Dilshan calls him through for a single
Dilshan tries to work the ball on the leg side but mis-times it
a huge swing from Dilshan across the line, Starc pitches on a good length and shapes the ball across the right-hander before bending it back in, that nearly shaved off stump
Mahela lets a good length ball go outside off
Wade leaps like a football goalkeeper to bring the wayward ball down leg side with both hands
short of a length outside off stump, Mahela stays in his crease and cuts the ball towards third man
a length ball outside off stump, Dilshan moves forward and drives the ball through mid-off
length once again outside off, Dilshan finds the gap at cover with a front-foot drive
width outside off stump and Dilshan sends the ball racing to the cover boundary with a powerful drive off the front foot
short of a length outside off, Dilshan lets it go
short of a length outside off stump, Mahela lets it go
defended off the back foot on the off side
